text:
Ah… We probably have a duplicate ID issue here that leads to our bootstrap code (attempting to) hydrate the first island twice.

:thinking_face: …

let me know if a fix is possible :slightly_smiling_face:

also if marketplace themes can be done in React, otherwise I will try to do a simple one for free just for the experience, I would definitely enjoy creating React websites for HS customers!

JS building blocks are not ready for the marketplace yet unfortunately, but it certainly is on the list. (Hint solving the HubL theme vs separate JS component project probably needs to come first :wink:)
